00063 static void rna_Image_save_render(Image *image, bContext *C, ReportList *reports, const char *path, Scene *scene)
00064 {
00065     ImBuf *ibuf;
00066 
00067     if (scene == NULL) {
00068         scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00069     }
00070 
00071     if (scene) {
00072         ImageUser iuser;
00073         void *lock;
00074 
00075         iuser.scene = scene;
00076         iuser.ok = 1;
00077 
00078         ibuf = BKE_image_acquire_ibuf(image, &iuser, &lock);
00079 
00080         if (ibuf == NULL) {
00081             BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Couldn't acquire buffer from image");
00082         }
00083         else {
00084             /* temp swap out the color */
00085             const unsigned char imb_planes_back = ibuf->planes;
00086             const float dither_back = ibuf->dither;
00087             ibuf->planes = scene->r.im_format.planes;
00088             ibuf->dither = scene->r.dither_intensity;
00089             if (!BKE_write_ibuf(ibuf, path, &scene->r.im_format)) {
00090                 BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Couldn't write image: %s", path);
00091             }
00092             ibuf->planes = imb_planes_back;
00093             ibuf->dither = dither_back;
00094         }
00095 
00096         BKE_image_release_ibuf(image, lock);
00097     }
00098     else {
00099         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Scene not in context, couldn't get save parameters");
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00103 static void rna_Image_save(Image *image, ReportList *reports)
00104 {
00105     ImBuf *ibuf = BKE_image_get_ibuf(image, NULL);
00106     if (ibuf) {
00107         char filename[FILE_MAX];
00108         BLI_strncpy(filename, image->name, sizeof(filename));
00109         BLI_path_abs(filename, G.main->name);
00110 
00111         if (image->packedfile) {
00112             if (writePackedFile(reports, image->name, image->packedfile, 0) != RET_OK) {
00113                 BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Image \"%s\" could saved packed file to \"%s\"", image->id.name+2, image->name);
00114             }
00115         }
00116         else if (IMB_saveiff(ibuf, filename, ibuf->flags)) {
00117             image->type = IMA_TYPE_IMAGE;
00118 
00119             if (image->source == IMA_SRC_GENERATED)
00120                 image->source = IMA_SRC_FILE;
00121 
00122             ibuf->userflags &= ~IB_BITMAPDIRTY;
00123         }
00124         else {
00125             BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Image \"%s\" could not be saved to \"%s\"", image->id.name+2, image->name);
00126         }
00127     }
00128     else {
00129         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Image \"%s\" does not have any image data", image->id.name+2);
00130     }
00131 }
00132 
00133 static void rna_Image_pack(Image *image, ReportList *reports, int as_png)
00134 {
00135     ImBuf *ibuf = BKE_image_get_ibuf(image, NULL);
00136 
00137     if (!as_png && (ibuf && (ibuf->userflags & IB_BITMAPDIRTY))) {
00138         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't pack edited image from disk, only as internal PNG");
00139     }
00140     else {
00141         if (as_png) {
00142             BKE_image_memorypack(image);
00143         }
00144         else {
00145             image->packedfile = newPackedFile(reports, image->name, ID_BLEND_PATH(G.main, &image->id));
00146         }
00147     }
00148 }
00149 
00150 static void rna_Image_unpack(Image *image, ReportList *reports, int method)
00151 {
00152     if (!image->packedfile) {
00153         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Image not packed");
00154     }
00155     else if (image->source == IMA_SRC_SEQUENCE || image->source == IMA_SRC_MOVIE) {
00156         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unpacking movies or image sequences not supported");
00157         return;
00158     }
00159     else {
00160         /* reports its own error on failure */
00161         unpackImage (reports, image, method);
00162     }
00163 }
00164 
00165 static void rna_Image_reload(Image *image)
00166 {
00167     BKE_image_signal(image, NULL, IMA_SIGNAL_RELOAD);
00168 }
00169 
00170 static void rna_Image_update(Image *image, ReportList *reports)
00171 {
00172     ImBuf *ibuf = BKE_image_get_ibuf(image, NULL);
00173 
00174     if (ibuf == NULL) {
00175         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Image \"%s\" does not have any image data", image->id.name+2);
00176         return;
00177     }
00178 
00179     IMB_rect_from_float(ibuf);
00180 }
00181 
00182 static int rna_Image_gl_load(Image *image, ReportList *reports, int filter, int mag)
00183 {
00184     ImBuf *ibuf;
00185     unsigned int *bind = &image->bindcode;
00186     int error = GL_NO_ERROR;
00187 
00188     if (*bind)
00189         return error;
00190 
00191     ibuf = BKE_image_get_ibuf(image, NULL);
00192 
00193     if (ibuf == NULL || ibuf->rect == NULL ) {
00194         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Image \"%s\" does not have any image data", image->id.name+2);
00195         return (int)GL_INVALID_OPERATION;
00196     }
00197 
00198     /* could be made into a function? */
00199     glGenTextures(1, (GLuint*)bind);
00200     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, *bind);
00201 
00202     if (filter != GL_NEAREST && filter != GL_LINEAR)
00203         error = (int)gluBuild2DMipmaps(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_RGBA, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, ibuf->rect);
00204 
00205     if (!error) {
00206         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, image->tpageflag & IMA_CLAMP_U ? GL_CLAMP : GL_REPEAT);
00207         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, image->tpageflag & IMA_CLAMP_V ? GL_CLAMP : GL_REPEAT);
00208         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, (GLint)filter);
00209         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, (GLint)mag);
00210         glTexEnvi(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_MODULATE);
00211         glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, ibuf->rect);
00212         error = (int)glGetError();
00213     }
00214 
00215     if (error) {
00216         glDeleteTextures(1, (GLuint*)bind);
00217         image->bindcode = 0;
00218     }
00219 
00220     return error;
00221 }
00222 
00223 static void rna_Image_gl_free(Image *image)
00224 {
00225     GPU_free_image(image);
00226 
00227     /* remove the nocollect flag, image is available for garbage collection again */
00228     image->flag &= ~IMA_NOCOLLECT;
00229 }

00233 void RNA_api_image(StructRNA *srna)
00234 {
00235     FunctionRNA *func;
00236     PropertyRNA *parm;
00237 
00238     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "save_render", "rna_Image_save_render");
00239     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Save image to a specific path using a scenes render settings");
00240     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_CONTEXT|FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00241     parm = RNA_def_string_file_path(func, "filepath", "", 0, "", "Save path");
00242     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00243     RNA_def_pointer(func, "scene", "Scene", "", "Scene to take image parameters from");
00244 
00245     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "save", "rna_Image_save");
00246     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Save image to its source path");
00247     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00248 
00249     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "pack", "rna_Image_pack");
00250     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Pack an image as embedded data into the .blend file");
00251     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00252     RNA_def_boolean(func, "as_png", 0, "as_png", "Pack the image as PNG (needed for generated/dirty images)");
00253 
00254     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "unpack", "rna_Image_unpack");
00255     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Save an image packed in the .blend file to disk");
00256     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00257     RNA_def_enum(func, "method", unpack_method_items, PF_USE_LOCAL, "method", "How to unpack");
00258 
00259     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "reload", "rna_Image_reload");
00260     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Reload the image from its source path");
00261 
00262     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "update", "rna_Image_update");
00263     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Update the display image from the floating point buffer");
00264     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00265 
00266     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "gl_load", "rna_Image_gl_load");
00267     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Load the image into OpenGL graphics memory");
00268     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00269     RNA_def_int(func, "filter", GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST, -INT_MAX, INT_MAX, "Filter",
00270                 "The texture minifying function", -INT_MAX, INT_MAX);
00271     RNA_def_int(func, "mag", GL_LINEAR, -INT_MAX, INT_MAX, "Magnification",
00272                 "The texture magnification function", -INT_MAX, INT_MAX);
00273     /* return value */
00274     parm = RNA_def_int(func, "error", 0, -INT_MAX, INT_MAX, "Error", "OpenGL error value", -INT_MAX, INT_MAX);
00275     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
00276 
00277     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "gl_free", "rna_Image_gl_free");
00278     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Free the image from OpenGL graphics memory");
00279 
00280     /* TODO, pack/unpack, maybe should be generic functions? */
00281 }
